s1.title: Books about Cocoon
s1.p: These are books about Cocoon, Version 2.x, which are already available or planned.

ul.li:
Cocoon: Building XML Applications (Carsten Ziegeler, Matthew Langham)
Availability: July 2002
Paperback: 504 pages
Publisher: New Riders Publishing
ISBN: 0735712352
Please note that you can download several free chapters at the New Riders web site.

Cocoon Developer's Handbook (Jeremy Aston, Lajos Moczar)
Availability: September 2002
Paperback: 500 pages
Publisher: Sams
ISBN: 0672322579

Cocoon 2 Programming: Web Publishing with XML and Java (Bill Brogden, Conrad D'Cruz, Mark Gaither)
Availability: October 2002
Paperback: 368 pages
Publisher: Sybex
ISBN: 0782141315

s1.title: How to get listed
s1.p: If you do not find your book here, make sure you tell us. Enter the title after the words "Link: Book:" in the subject, and provide a short summary of your book. Do not forget to tell us the URL if possible (preferably direct to the publisher, rather than any particular bookshop). You could also follow the Contributing page to make it easier for everyone.
